main.changelog:
Changelog:
Pedal
- Increased control point count for force-travel curve 
- Added joystick mapping functionality
- Added ADS1220 support for V6 board
- Rudder packets now broadcasted instead of unicast
- Adjusted joystick ESP-NOW packet interval to 2ms, rudder to 5ms
- Increased serial baudrate for CH343-based boards (V4/V5/V6/PCBA v2)
- Added emergency button support for PCBA v2 users
- pedalupdate and serial tasks now execute in RAM
- Enabled function-level profiling
- DAP version: 152  
- Firmware version: 0.90.15
--- 
Bridge
- Improved USB HID joystick stability 
- Joystick updates only on value changes
- Removed Wi-Fi power limit
- DAP version: 152  
- Firmware version: 0.90.15
--- 
Plugin 
- Force-travel curve is now fully adjustable   
  - Right-click on canvas to add a control point  
  - Right-click on a point to remove it  
  - Supports 6 to 11 points  
- Added joystick mapping tab with deadzone control  
  - Similar interface to the force-travel curve  
  - Drag endpoints to define deadzone  
  - Supports 6 to 11 control points  
- Serial COM port now shows chip/device name
- Visual UI updates
- Improved error handling for custom effects
- Added update notifications
- Dynamically sets baudrate to 3M for V4/V5/V6/PCBA v2 boards
- DAP version: 152  
- Plugin version: 0.90.15
--- 
Rudder 
- Added helicopter mode 
- New configuration section for mode switching (Flight / Helicopter)
- Force-curve control now matches functionality of the Pedal tab
- Plugin now remembers last-used configuration parameters  
  - Import/export config remains supported

dev-build.changelog:
FOR PCBA V2 and PCB V3 USER, please update this build via USB, DO NOT UPDATE VIA OTA


Pedal

* Updated Arduino framework to version 3.3.0.
* Improved runtime performance, resulting in smoother operation.
* Refactored most task processes.
* Rewrote the serial communication for a significant performance boost.
* Modified the partition table for Gilphilbert PCBA V2 and PCB V3 users.
* PCB V3 now supports OTA-pull, eliminating the need for manual binary file uploads.
* Added a new Smoothness parameter with a default value of 20.
* DAP version: 155
* Firmware version: 0.90.16

---

### Bridge

* Updated Arduino framework to version 3.3.0.
* Stabilized basic state packet communication.
* DAP version: 155
* Firmware version: 0.90.16

---

### Plugin

* Rewrote serial communication for pedals.
* Removed the

.
* Added a smoothness factor slider in the Filter tab.
* DAP version: 155
* Plugin version: 0.90.16
